statements: SELECT * FROM ARQuizScores WHERE student_id = 10;
SELECT id, score, date_completed FROM ARQuizScores WHERE quiz_id = 5;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM ARQuizScores WHERE date_completed = '2022-01-15';
SELECT * FROM ARQuizScores WHERE quiz_id = 3 ORDER BY score DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS avg_score FROM ARQuizScores GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT * FROM ARQuizScores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score FROM ARQuizScores WHERE date_completed > '2022-01-01'
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM ARQuizScores GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY average_score DESC
SELECT MAX(score) AS highest_score FROM ARQuizScores
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_quizzes FROM ARQuizScores
SELECT * FROM ar_quiz_scores ORDER BY student_id ASC
SELECT student_id, score FROM ar_quiz_scores WHERE score > 80
SELECT quiz_id, score FROM ar_quiz_scores ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT * FROM student_performance_reports WHERE grade = 'A'
SELECT student_id, average_score FROM student_performance_reports WHERE total_quiz_scores >= 5
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, score, date_completed FROM ar_quiz_scores WHERE score > 90 ORDER BY date_completed DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT student_id, AVG(score) AS average_score, MAX(score) AS max_score FROM ar_quiz_scores GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(score) > 80;

SELECT s.student_id, s.grade, r.total_quiz_scores FROM student_performance_reports s JOIN ar_quiz_scores r ON s.student_id = r.student_id WHERE r.score BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY r.score DESC LIMIT 5;

SELECT s.student_id, s.grade, COUNT(r.quiz_id) AS total_quizzes FROM student_performance_reports s LEFT JOIN ar_quiz_scores r ON s.student_id = r.student_id GROUP BY s.student_id HAVING total_quizzes >= 3;

SELECT s.student_id, r.quiz_id, r.score, s.grade FROM student_performance_reports s INNER JOIN ar_quiz_scores r ON s.student_id = r.student_id WHERE s.grade = 'B' AND r.score < 80 ORDER BY r.score DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT student_id, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE quiz_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, total_score, pass_score FROM quizzes WHERE total_score > 50;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, completed_date FROM quiz_scores WHERE student_id = 100 ORDER BY completed_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT student_name, grade_level FROM students ORDER BY grade_level DESC;
SELECT quiz_name, total_score FROM quizzes WHERE pass_score > 80;
SELECT student_id, quiz_id, MAX(score) FROM quiz_scores GROUP BY student_id, quiz_id;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN quiz_scores ON students.student_id = quiz_scores.student_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT full_name, grade_level FROM students WHERE grade_level = 10;
SELECT quiz_name, topic FROM quizzes ORDER BY quiz_name DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT students.full_name, performance_reports.score FROM students JOIN performance_reports ON students.student_id = performance_reports.student_id;
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY student_id DESC, quiz_id ASC
SELECT full_name, grade_level, quiz_name FROM students s JOIN quizzes q ON s.student_id = q.quiz_id WHERE s.grade_level > 10
SELECT MAX(score) AS max_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM performance_reports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT * FROM students s LEFT JOIN performance_reports pr ON s.student_id = pr.student_id WHERE pr.report_id IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT topic FROM quizzes ORDER BY topic
SELECT * FROM quiz_scores;
SELECT student_id, quiz_date, score FROM quiz_scores ORDER BY score DESC;

SELECT student_name, quiz_name, subject_name, score FROM students s JOIN student_performance sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN quizzes q ON q.quiz_id = sp.quiz_id JOIN subjects su ON su.subject_id = sp.subject_id;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(quiz_id) AS total_quizzes FROM student_performance GROUP BY student_id;
SELECT subject_name, AVG(score) AS average_score FROM student_performance sp JOIN subjects su ON su.subject_id = sp.subject_id GROUP BY subject_name;
SELECT student_name, subject_name, score FROM students s JOIN student_performance sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN subjects sub ON sp.subject_id = sub.subject_id
SELECT MAX(score) AS max_score, AVG(score) AS avg_score, MIN(score) AS min_score FROM student_performance
SELECT student_id, quiz_date, score FROM quiz_scores WHERE score > 80 ORDER BY quiz_date DESC
SELECT quiz_name, subject_name, score FROM quizzes q JOIN student_performance sp ON q.quiz_id = sp.quiz_id JOIN subjects sub ON sp.subject_id = sub.subject_id

SELECT student_name, quiz_name, subject_name, score FROM students s JOIN student_performance sp ON s.student_id = sp.student_id JOIN quizzes q ON sp.quiz_id = q.quiz_id JOIN subjects sub ON sp.subject_id = sub.subject_id
